ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: Just one . . . me, almost 31.  Besides that there is a level 28, 12 and a 7. I did a /who all bard 30 40, /who all bard 41 50, /who all bard 51 60, the other
ygData.messageBody:
Just one . . . me, almost 31. Besides that there is a level 28, 12 and a 7.
I did a /who all bard 30 40, /who all bard 41 50, /who all bard 51 60, the
other day when there were 2400 people on the server and only came up with a
total of about 30 people across all 3 searches. =\ More armor for me I guess!

-Steve


At 08:05 AM 10/12/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Just a quick question. How many bards above 30 are there in your guilds?
>
>The more i play, the less bards i realize there are. When i do a /who all
>bard in my guild, i count 2 bards at the most, me and a lev 52 (unless
>there's a hidden one somewhere). How sad is that? do a /who all warrior or
>any other class in the guild and you'll see on average 7. Mind you in a
>weird way this is to my advantage as whenever i'm planes capable, i wont
>have to lotto for imbrued since she's got a full set, a breath of harmony
>and a partisan. But still, i still wish there were more bards around but i
>think the numbers will keep dropping as i read this mailing list 8(
>................
>Minkin
>Valorium
>Sol Ro
